value.title: How Artificial Intelligence Is Used in Finance
value.excerpt: One of the most common applications of artificial intelligence in finance is in lending. Machine learning algorithms and pattern recognition allow businesses to go beyond the typical examination of credit scores and credit histories to rate borrowers' creditworthiness when applying for credit cards and other loans.
